edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.CumulativeDistributionFunction.CumulativeDistributionFunction ( Histogram  hist  )  

00024                                                          {
00025         this.min = hist.getMin();
00026         this.incr = hist.getIncr();
00027         prob = new float[hist.getHist().length];
00028         int tot = 0;
00029         for (int i=0; i < hist.getHist().length; ++i){
00030             tot += hist.getHist()[i];
00031         }
00032         if ( tot == 0 ) return;
00033         
00034         int sofar = 0;
00035         for (int i=0; i < hist.getHist().length; ++i){
00036             sofar += hist.getHist()[i];
00037             prob[i] = sofar / (float) tot;
00038         }
00039     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.CumulativeDistributionFunction.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00069                                                             {
00070         // create output directory
00071         File outdir = OutputDirectory.getDefault("cdf");
00072         
00073         // read input
00074         LatLonGrid conus = SurfaceAlbedo.read(SurfaceAlbedo.CONUS, 100);
00075         
00076         // find histogram
00077         final int MIN = 0;
00078         final int MAX = 30;
00079         for (int incr=1; incr < 10; incr += 2){
00080             Histogram hist = new Histogram(MIN, incr, (MAX-MIN)/incr );
00081             hist.update(conus);
00082             CumulativeDistributionFunction cdf = new CumulativeDistributionFunction(hist);
00083             System.out.println("INCR=" + incr + " nbins=" + cdf.prob.length);
00084             System.out.println(cdf);
00085             String filename = outdir.getAbsolutePath() + "/cdf_" + incr + ".txt";
00086             PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(filename));
00087             writer.println(cdf);
00088             writer.close();
00089             System.out.println("Wrote to " + filename);
00090         }
00091     }

Override String edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.CumulativeDistributionFunction.toString (  )  

00054                             {
00055         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00056         for (int i=0; i < prob.length; ++i){
00057             int sval = min + i * incr;
00058             int eval = sval + incr;
00059             sb.append(sval);
00060             sb.append(" ");
00061             sb.append(eval);
00062             sb.append(" ");
00063             sb.append(prob[i]);
00064             sb.append("\n");
00065         }
00066         return sb.toString();
00067     }
